com.espertech.esper.client

Class ConfigurationDBRef.DriverManagerConnection

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.espertech.esper.client.ConfigurationDBRef.DriverManagerConnection
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ConfigurationDBRef.ConnectionFactoryDesc, java.io.Serializable
    Enclosing class:
    ConfigurationDBRef

    public static class ConfigurationDBRef.DriverManagerConnection
extends java.lang.Object
implements ConfigurationDBRef.ConnectionFactoryDesc, java.io.Serializable
    Connection factory settings for using a DriverManager.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Constructor Summary

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.lang.String getClassName()
      Returns the driver manager class name.
      java.lang.String getOptionalPassword()
      Returns the password to connect to the database, or null if none supplied, since the password can also be supplied through properties.
      java.util.Properties getOptionalProperties()
      Returns the properties, if supplied, to use for obtaining a connection via driver manager.
      java.lang.String getOptionalUserName()
      Returns the user name to connect to the database, or null if none supplied, since the user name can also be supplied through properties.
      java.lang.String getUrl()
      Returns the database URL to use to obtains connections.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait
